{{cpp/numeric/random/poisson_distribution/title|mean}}
{{cpp/numeric/random/poisson_distribution/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=c++11 | 1=
double mean() const;
}}

Returns the {{math|μ}} parameter the distribution was constructed with. The parameter defines mean number of occurrences of the event. The default value is {{c|1.0}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Floating point value identifying the {{math|μ}} distribution parameter.
